TEXT.TITLE: GENRAD <GEN> SHIPS CHIP TEST SYSTEM
TEXT.BODY: GenRad Inc said its Semiconductor Test Group shipped a GR125 VSLI test system to Marshall Industries <MI>. GenRad said the new digital integrated circuit tester will be used in Marshall's Milpitas plant for retest and certification of programmable logic devices that Marshall distributes. Reuter
